15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdarg.h>
20#include <stdbool.h>
21#include <stdlib.h>
22#include <stdio.h>
23
24#include <isc/print.h>
25
26#include "util.h"
27
28extern bool verbose;
29extern const char *progname;
30
31void
32notify(const char *fmt, ...) {
33 va_list ap;
34
35 if (verbose) {
36 va_start(ap, fmt);
37 vfprintf(stderr, fmt, ap);
38 va_end(ap);
39 fputs("\n", stderr);
40 }
41}
42
43void
44fatal(const char *format, ...) {
45 va_list args;
46
47 fprintf(stderr, "%s: ", progname);
48 va_start(args, format);
49 vfprintf(stderr, format, args);
50 va_end(args);
51 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
52 exit(1);
53}
54
